page.title: 14SPORT
page.content: In the area, sport and recreational facilities are based around a leisure centre. Bramcote squash and swimming complex cost Â£240,000 to build in 1965. In 1973 it opened a health suite which includes sauna, squash courts and a swimming pool. A spa pool was added and a synthetic five a side football pitch was built costing Â£20,000. Also in 1984 an aquaslide was assembled. Approximately six to seven thousand people visit the leisure centre each week. The sauna is used mainly by adults in their thirties and there twice as many children as adults who use the pool. Since expansion of the facilities, several new jobs have been created.
